title: Stop Worrying: Relax and Be Happy
description: This book, by the noted Egyptian scholar of recent times, discusses: Renew your life! -- Living according to one's daily commitments -- Firmness, lassitute, and deception -- Worries and venoms -- How to eliminate the causes of worry -- Knowledge produced by action -- Make lemonade out of lemons -- Purity of Secrecy and Publicity -- and much more!
author: محمد الغزالي
